title: [The Battle of Broken Hill : publicity kit]
brief_description: Publicity kit for the production The Battle of Broken Hill (1981), including 4 B&W Stills (Large), 2 Colour Stills (Small), 1 B&W Proof Sheet, 1 Press Kit/ Review, 4 Promo Flyers
